name: obsidian-tars
description: Text generation based on tag suggestions, using DeepSeek, Claude, OpenAI, OpenRouter, SiliconFlow, Gemini, Qwen & more.

scripts.check:all: pnpm run check:syncpack && pnpm run check:manypkg && pnpm run check:knip
scripts.version: node bin/version-bump.mjs && git add apps/obsidian-plugin/manifest.json apps/obsidian-plugin/versions.json
scripts.graph:tasks: mkdir -p docs/graphs && pnpm dlx turbo run build lint test --dry-run=json --graph docs/graphs/turbo-tasks.jpg
scripts.graph:imports: mkdir -p docs/graphs && pnpm dlx dependency-cruiser --include-only '^(apps|packages)' --output-type dot apps packages | dot -Tsvg -o docs/graphs/workspace-imports.svg

author: C Jack<https://github.com/ae86jack>
